If you delete the category you will lose your progress.

passwordSecurityTab.title: Password & Security
passwordSecurityTab.subTitle: You can change your password using the current one.
passwordSecurityTab.changePasswordModalDescription: Reset your current password to new one.
passwordSecurityTab.changePasswordConfirm: Are you sure you want to change the password?
